forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers this morning changing to mainly rain showers for the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers this morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers for the afternoon hours. High 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 36F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
